__TOC__

The Desktop Experience Team (or "DX Team" for short) is an engineering team at Canonical developing a set of new technologies for the Linux desktop, including:
* <nowiki>[[Unity|Unity]]</nowiki>, the new netbook oriented user interface
* <nowiki>[[Ayatana|"Ayatana"]]</nowiki> cross-desktop libraries like: <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/dbusmenu|dbusmenu]]</nowiki> or the set of <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~indicator-applet-developers|panel indicators]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[Multitouch|Multitouch]]</nowiki>, the Ubuntu gesture stack introduced with Maverick Meerkat 10.10
